pr_title: LayoutEditor:Add menu to change toolbar coordinates format

timeline.message:
WIP:LayoutEditor:Add popup menu to change toolbar coordinates format

Contextual-(right- or control-)click on the coordinates in the toolbar to popup a menu that allows you to change between pixel (default), metric (cm) or English (feet, inches) representations.
Note: Current also changes grid intervals (metric: 10/10, english 12/16)… but doesn't have to.

timeline.bodyText: Please check for the isPopupTrigger in all three of mousePressed(MouseEvent e), mouseReleased(MouseEvent e) and mouseClicked(MouseEvent e).  Different look-and-feels use the mouse differently, so by checking all three you make sure that the popup gesture will be recognize across all types.
